import sys
for _ in range(int(sys.stdin.readline())):
    s = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    if s % 2 == 1:
        print('-1')
        continue
    print('1', s // 2)

ans = []
for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    if n % 2 == 1:
        ans.append('-1')
        continue
    ans.append(f'{n // 2} {1}')
print(*ans, sep='\n')

[print(1, int(i / 2)) if i % 2 == 0 else print(-1) for i in a]

a = []
